#include<iostream>
#include<cstring>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
int t;
char str[100001];
cin>>t;
while(t--)
{
cin>>str;
int l=strlen(str),count=0;
for(long i=0;i<l;i++)
{
if(str[i]=='T')
count++;
else
count--;
if(count<0)
break;
}
if(count==0)
cout<<"YES"<<endl;
else
cout<<"NO"<<endl;
}
return 0;
}
